String.string: [Cave, northeastern end of Vale of Spires] Go to the cave at the northern end, where the Valkyon Federation soldiers are preparing to launch an attack on the Ebon Tower. Then meet with Centurion Traveron and find out about the tower.
[Ebon Tower Entrance, Vale of Spires] Go to the Ebon Tower teleportal with Killian's gem.
Bring Killian's gem close to the Ebon Tower teleportal.
This can't be...I should have the power!
[Ebon Tower] Go to the highest floor in the Ebon Tower and eliminate Thulsa.
Inner Chamber of the Ebon Tower
I think Thulsa escaped through the teleportal!
[Ebon Tower - Quintus] Go after Thulsa! He's escaping!
[Vale of Spires] Investigate the Ebon Tower teleportal to find traces of Thulsa.
